Cnf_tokenMsg1: Please keep this token safe and use it carefully to keep you account safe. If HAWKI detects suspicious behaviour this token will be revoked.
Cnf_tokenMsg2: Once you close this window you will not be able to get this key again.
Cnf_tokenRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke token
Cnf_passkeyRemove:
By confirming this, your Datakey and keychain data will be removed from this browser. Please remember that we currently don't provide any Datakey recovery solutions.
Please make sure that you have a secure backup of your Datakey before proceeding.
AboutHAWKI_Info: The offering was developed in the Interaction Design Lab at HAWK to give all university members the opportunity to integrate artificial intelligence into work processes and to have a space for exchange, potentially resulting in new working methods and fostering an internal university discussion on the use of AI. This offering also aims to provide didactic support, to develop an understanding of the functioning of a language model, and therefore gives indications of well-operating prompts (text inputs) in different areas. We welcome constructive feedback to further develop this offering in line with your needs and insights.
AboutHAWKI_VincentInfo: | Research Associate | Head of Interaction Design Lab
ClearLocalData: Remove local data and sign out
HS-LostBothT: Did you lose both your Datakey and Recovery Code?
HS-LostBothB: Unfortuately if you've lost both your Datakey and Recovery Code, we can't recover your profile data. To continue we need to reset your profile and give you a new access. This will remove all your previous data including all your chats and rooms. Do you want to continue?
ImgUploadDesc:
Select an image or drag it here.
Double-click to enter edit mode.
Input_Placeholder_Chat: You can enter your request here
Input_Placeholder_Room: Write a group message or use the AI model by mentioning
MistakeWarning: HAWKI may make mistakes. Check important information.
Reg_SL1_T: From now on, your chats will be saved, so you can access them later at any time, across devices. Your entries are completely secure: everything you write is encrypted. This means that no one, not even the university, can see what you have written. üïµÔ∏è Your entries are stored at OpenAI for 30 days and then deleted. GWDG does not store any data. In both cases, your data remains unused for product improvement or behavioral analysis.
Reg_SL2_T: In the new group chats, naturally, all group members can see your messages - that's the whole point. But even here, your content remains protected and is not visible to anyone outside the group. Your privacy is important to us, so you can rest assured: your data belongs to you alone! üôå
Reg_SL4_T: Important: You'll create your personal Datakey, a type of password, during your first login. This Datakey encrypts your chats before they're stored on our server. In addition to your regular login, you'll need your Datakey when signing in on a new device. Your device will remember your Datakey, so you won't need to enter it every time. In the final step, you can also download your Datakey recovery code.
Reg_SL5_T: Please note: Your chat messages are securely encrypted. If you lose your Datakey, you won't be able to access your previous chats. Therefore, keep your Datakey safe and protect it from third-party access.
Reg_SL6_T: With this recovery code, you can restore your Datakey if you forget or lose it. Download the code to your device and store it in a safe place, e.g., on a USB drive or in a protected environment. Now enjoy using HAWKI2! üöÄ
StartBanner: What shall we start with today? üëè
PH_SearchBar: Enter Name, Username oder E-Mail Address
Api_Warning: To be able to use the HAWKI language models in other applications, you can generate your own API key. To do this, send an email to your IT department, who will generate the API key for you and send it to you.
